titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to permit the State of Utah to construct a hook ramp as part of the highway project to reconstruct the interchange at Interstate Route 15 and University Parkway in Orem, Utah.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: 10/6/2000--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Transportation to permit the State of Utah to construct a hook ramp connecting 1200 West to Interstate Route 15 as part of the highway project to reconstruct the interchange at Interstate Route 15 and University Parkway in Orem, Utah.
